Complex polynomial roots using the [Durand-Kerner-Weierstrass](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Durand-Kerner_method) method in Ada. An example of instantiating [`Generic_Roots`](generic_roots.ads) and invoking it may be found [here](croot.adb). Typical output is shown below:

```
$ gprbuild croot && ./obj/croot
â€¦
```
